DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to determine the efficacy of once-daily rosuvastatin in reducing LDL-C in children and adolescents aged 10-17 years with HeFH from baseline (Day 0) to the end of the 12-week double-blind treatment period.
DOC.brief_title: PLUTO: Pediatric Lipid-redUction Trial of rOsuvastatin
DOC.criteria: Male or female (at least 1 year postmenarche) children and adolescents (aged 10 17 years) with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HeFH) Certain medical conditions and lab test results History of a reaction to rosuvastatin or other statin drugs Use of specified disallowed medications
